main event: A 12-year-old observer reported seeing a balloon with a flashing light in Vandalia, Ohio on 23 Oct 60.
interesting points: The observer initially thought the balloon was a plane due to its odd flight path., The balloon hovered silently at one point., The observation was made late at night at 11:55 PM EDT., The conclusion drawn from the sighting was that it was a probable balloon., There were numerous aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a balloon with a flashing light
